column4: hi, I upgraded from karmic to lucid and it won't boot now. i'm using BURG
presse F1 key to see the terminal
ok try to boot in recovery mode
to see all the boot messages
says: "/dev/sdb1 has been mounted 23 times without being checked, check forced"
although i did check it with a livecd and it said it was clean
the cursor is blinking and nothing is going on, should i wait?
the system clearly try to chek your disk, this is not a unsolvable problem !!
now it says: "/dev/sdb1: 474308/9773056 files (2.0% non contagious), ###### blocks"
ok do you have a large hdd
